name: Tiny Diggers 2
blurb: Tiny Diggers 2 is an open-world, sandbox construction truck game for kids and parents.

rewards.reward: No Reward

FOREMAN'S ASSISTANT 
=============================
We'll add some animals to the game (kid-friendly animals only). You choose their name for the ID tag around their neck and where they should be found within the map. Some of them may even follow you around! Examples could be: dog, cat, rabbit, frog, mouse, squirrel etc. No insects or large animals.
